data.actual_result: im still deafened after i exit voice and video settings
data.expected_result: i shouldn't be deafened when there is no mic testing going on
data.short_description: clicking on the mic test button multiple times will keep you deafened even after you exit settings if you're in a call
data.steps_to_repro: - join a voice channel - go to to voice settings - click on the "let's check" button multiple times for about 5 seconds because why not - close settings and observe that you're still deafened/muted
